metadata.comments: This OKTA connector uses okta API to perform different actions on the user accounts.
metadata.author: Sindhu Talluri,OKTA

uiDefinition.description: The API Key for this api

properties.description: This is the Okta Custom Connector

get.description: Action used to fetch user details

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

department.description: Department of the user which he belonging
department.title: department

countryCode.description: User country code where is living
countryCode.title: countryCode

put.description: Action used to updates user's profile or credentials using strict-update semantics

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

post.description: Action uses to suspend existing user and returns them to the "De-active" state

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

post.description: Action uses to unsuspend a user and returns them to the ACTIVE state

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

post.description: Action used to resets password with a temp password or password link.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

parameters.name: sendEmail
parameters.description: If  sendEmail is false, returns a link for the user to reset their password.

get.description: Action used fetch groups detail of the particular user

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

delete.description: Action used to clear/delete all provider sessions

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

delete.description: Action used to remove/delete existing member from group

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Please enter group id (Unique identifier of the  group)

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

put.description: Action used to add new user to the group

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Please enter group id (Unique identifier of the group)

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

get.description: Action used to list all the member group

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Please enter group id (Unique identifier of the  group)

get.description: Action used  to fetch all the factors which user belonging

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

delete.description: Action used to reset the factor object of  the user

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

parameters.name: factorId
parameters.description: Please enter factor id (Unique identifier of the  factor)

get.description: Action used to fetch list of group details

post.description: Action used to change the existing password when current password expired

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: Please enter user id (Unique identifier of the user)

parameters.name: tempPassword
parameters.description: If tempPassword is included in the request, the user's password is reset to a temporary password that is returned, and then the temporary password is expired
